Words With Friends by Zynga

Embark on a delightful lexical journey with â€œWords With Friends,â€ an enthralling crossword puzzle app that brings the classic enjoyment of Scrabble to your digital devices. Whether you have an Android, iPhone, iPad, or Windows Phone, this game is crafted to bring together word enthusiasts from all walks of life.

Brief

Build your vocabulary, strategize with tiles, and go head-to-head with friends and word buffs around the globe. With an interface designed to mimic Scrabble, Words With Friends challenges you to think creatively, improve your word power, and have fun in the process.
